Package org.vraptor.url

URL to logic translation classes and interfaces.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
LogicLocator Locates the logic method for this request.
RequestInfo Encapsulates the component name and logic name that will be invoked.
ViewLocator Locates the view manager for this request.
 

Class Summary
DefaultLogicLocator The default url manager translates url data.
DefaultRequestInfo Simple implementation of a request info.
DefaultViewLocator  
 

Exception Summary
InvalidURLException Invalid url was requested.
 

Package org.vraptor.url Description

URL to logic translation classes and interfaces.
